column4: Greetings: can anyone advise me on a dual-boot (Maverick-XP) grub2 issue? I have 2 separate drives, defreagged the XP drive (where grub is) and it's gone haywire.
gone haywire doesn't make much sense -- does it take a chainsaw and try to kill you? What is the exact behaviour?
sorry, it sent me to grub rescue prompt.
